name: Android Checkers 474
short_description:
This is an android implementation of Checkers used in a software engineering course and made open source for an OSS class as a framework for learning open source hosting.  The version being uploaded is our 0.0.1 version which we have since moved past and is being developed independently.  Developments made to the SourceForge open source version will remain unique to this version and not be implemented in a graded copy of the project. 
The 0.0.1 version implements:
-Board displayed on an android canvas.
-Legal move is during your turn, you can move your piece to any unoccupied location.
-Jumps/kings/legal moves have not been initialized yet.
-Movement is clicking, not dragging.  If a click is legal the piece will hilight.  When you click a second piece the hilight will be removed and either the piece will be moved and turn will change, or piece will remain and your turn will remain.
